about_the_game:
Project 1942 is a World War II shooter aiming to encompass the full scope of the war – at sea, in the air, or on land.


Experience the tumultuous battlegrounds of World War II like never before in Project 1942, a riveting shooter that plunges you into the heart of history's most defining conflict. Set across land, sea, and air, this ambitious game is a sweeping homage to the monumental events that shaped the 20th century.

It's a throwback to the good old days.

Assemble your squad and dive into intense, teamwork-driven gameplay that captures the essence of warfare on every front. Whether you're engaging in ferocious naval battles, dominating the skies in thrilling aerial dogfights, or fighting tooth and nail on the ground, every moment is infused with the adrenaline-pumping authenticity of the era.

With a commitment to accessibility, Project 1942 welcomes both seasoned veterans and casual players alike. Even if you only have time for a single round, you'll find yourself immersed in the action, propelled by the camaraderie of your fellow soldiers. Communication is key, so grab your microphone and prepare to coordinate with your teammates for victory.

While the Conquest game mode serves as the backbone of the experience, there's an exciting array of gameplay options on the horizon. From the strategic depth of the Objective mode to the pulse-pounding intensity of future expansions, the journey through World War II's most iconic battles is just beginning.

Project 1942 isn't just a game; it's a nostalgic homage to the classic shooters of yesteryear, infused with modern sensibilities and cutting-edge technology thanks to the Unreal Engine 5. Step back in time and rewrite the pages of history in this unforgettable journey through the annals of war.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
